GSD.product_version: versions from v3.18 to before v5.15.27
GSD.description:
net: arcnet: com20020: Fix null-ptr-deref in com20020pci_probe()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.27 by commit ea372aab54903310756217d81610901a8e66cb7d, it was introduced in version v3.18 by commit 8c14f9c70327a6fb75534c4c61d7ea9c82ccf78f. For more details please see the references link.
